details.description:
Public hours:
Monday to Friday - 9.00am to 12.00pm
            
Office hours: 
Monday to Thursday - 8.00am to 4.00pm 
Friday - 8.00am to 12.00pm
Passports collection Monday - Friday 9.00am to 12.00pm
details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

We aim to make ourselves as accessible to everyone as possible. The High Commission staff are more than happy to assist with wheel-chair access for persons with wheel-chairs. On arrival, speak with the guards at the guard house and they will contact the Main Reception who will arrange for the wheel-chair access to be opened and assistance given.

We also welcome guide dogs and provide assistance upon request to visually impaired visitors.

2016 Public holidays

The British High Commission will be closed on the following local and UK public holidays:

  • Friday 01 January - New Year’s Day

  • Friday 25 March - Good Friday

  • Monday 28 March - Easter Monday

  • Monday 02 May - May Bank Holiday

  • Monday 30 May - Spring Bank Holiday

  • Tuesday 31 May - Privilege Holiday for HM The Queen’s birthday (UK)

  • Monday 13 June - PNG Queen’s Birthday

  • Friday 26 August - PNG National Repentance Day

  • Monday 29 August - Summer Bank Holiday

  • Friday 16 September - PNG Independence Day

  • Monday 26 December - Boxing Day

  • Tuesday 27 December - In lieu of 25 December

Holiday’s marked* are UK Public & Privilege Holidaysv
